one_reviews_text: There was no one there when I visited.
i said yes i see you riped off the recroom arms i can see that
review_feedback:
Hello Dominatorplays,
Thanks for the review! Yes, this game is inspired by RecRoom. It is also an open-source project that is intended for players like you to enhance and create different content! Feel free to check out the website here: https://jackyangzzh.github.io/Poly-Space-VR/

review_title: Great to see an open source game!
one_reviews_text: I like the idea of an open source game a lot. I actually prefer using this for meeting small groups of friends rather than a giant platform like VR chat
